I chose a Canon to minimize the risk that I would buy a camera that disappointed and camera again has delivered a quality camera at a great price.  My daughter says it's the perfect camera for her.

Reviews.Title: Purchased As Gift
Reviews.Author: Elizabeth "Liz"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera as a gift for my son and he says thst he couldn't be happier with it. It takes great pictures.I'm considering purchasing one for myself.

Reviews.Title: Canon PowerShot ELPH 115 IS16MP Digital Camera (Silver)
Reviews.Author: Marie Phoenix
Reviews.Content: It is small enough to put into my purse. It has all the new features.  It is easy to use and take s good pictures.

Reviews.Title: Good camera
Reviews.Author: Tb2k82CE
Reviews.Content: This is my granddaughter's camera.  She is 7 years old and wanted a big persons camera in pink.  Try to find that sometime.  Anyway she loved it.I have always slipped my digital camera around my grand kids neck and let them walk around taking pictures.  Their parents all have the same reaction to their children having a $1000 plus digital camera in their hands.  But I'm grandpa and watching the kids walk around taking pictures of things is a great form of entertainment.  Photography is a wonderful hobby and as I have gotten older I have given up lugging around my Canon SLR Digital and size down to non interchangeable lens SLR type digital cameras. Recommend purchase your child a $100 - $150 camera and then take them out to shoot pictures.

Reviews.Title: Canon Powershot Elph
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: The camera takes beautiful pictures and I always had a canon camera because I like the features that the camera has.

Reviews.Title: Canon PowerShot ELPH 115 IS16 MP Digital
Reviews.Author: Sheila
Reviews.Content: I love this camera and I would recommend it to all my friends.  The small size is perfect to carry in your pocket.

Reviews.Title: Great simple camera
Reviews.Author: DH336
Reviews.Content: Got this for my daughter. It takes great pictures and its small size is perfect gor 8 year old daughter. Guess im old fashioned but I still like cameras better then cell phone pics.

Reviews.Title: Buy this camera
Reviews.Author: Gary D. James "applegate"
Reviews.Content: Best digital camera and cost of any thing I have looked at so don't even bother to look else where.

Reviews.Title: wrong one
Reviews.Author: rebecca
Reviews.Content: i am sure this is nice, but i was dissappointed in the color. so, i ordered a nikon that will be more appropriate.

Reviews.Title: What a great deal!
Reviews.Author: Mark Twain "Sam"
Reviews.Content: I got this at Amazon when they were having their pre Christmas sale.  It was a great price and has a lot of features.  Even though I'll probably never use half of them, it's nice to know that they are there.  The 16MP are nice but if you are trying to get a close up on a quarter or dime or something it's gonna be tough (or fuzzy) since that was my original idea being a coin collector.  But for taking pictures of everything else this is perfect for it!

Reviews.Title: Pretty
Reviews.Author: Karen R. Wheeler
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my granddaughter and would recommend buying the extended warranty with it. The parts seem very tiny and fragile.

Reviews.Title: Package not complete.
Reviews.Author: Sparkletrees
Reviews.Content: The package was not complete. When the camera box was opened on Christmas morning it didn't have the hand strap or the cable connection in the package.  Edit:  the box was not supposed to have the cable connection, but it was supposed to have the wrist strap.  That is missing.

Reviews.Title: I love this camera
Reviews.Author: Bella
Reviews.Content: My sister purchased me this camera for christmas and i fell in love with it! The pictures are great and the video is HD. Its small so it can fit in any purse or even your pocket! Once i took a picture it came out really crisp. The videos come out great. Only thing is to take a picture in the dark you must have flash on to see clearly. Besides that i recommend having this camera! Great camera for a great price !

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Love the small size and canons in my book are the best cameras. Can take with you anywhere.  Love it!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Nice point and shoot
Reviews.Author: Hot Glass
Reviews.Content: This is a great little point and shoot camera with many options for creative photographs if you so desire.  Recommend this camera.

Reviews.Title: wife friendly
Reviews.Author: Robert Galloway
Reviews.Content: My wife likes it very much. I bought it for her because I have one of my own and I love it.

Reviews.Title: Great small camera
Reviews.Author: E. Mckay "jamal8"
Reviews.Content: I wanted small and capable, and that's what I got. Several gripes include difficulty in achieving the close-up lens unless the ambient light is really, really bright; and printing the manual is a pain.

Reviews.Title: This is a great camera for our porposes.
Reviews.Author: Robert Reedy
Reviews.Content: This is a great camera for our porposes. Pictures are sharp and colors are good. The product was delivered on time and we are very pleased with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: Takes reasonable pictures for the price -last camera was sharper.
Reviews.Author: Robert Anderson "Bob in Bloomington"
Reviews.Content: Not the camera the SD1200 it replaced, but it works and is a size easy to carry.  No lmemory card with it and no instuction CD.

Reviews.Title: Slow in taking a pic.
Reviews.Author: su su
Reviews.Content: It's small and light. But the screen is not good and also too slow in taking pics. Won't recommend though.

Reviews.Title: So far so good--Great delivery and price-Bad shipping package
Reviews.Author: Huxley
Reviews.Content: Camera is very good so far.  Picture quality is very good at 16mp.  At this price range a very good product for the price.  Zoom is nice at 8 to 1 optical.  The shipping carton was never sealed and anyone could have taken the camera right out.

Reviews.Title: Cheaper elsewhere
Reviews.Author: rue
Reviews.Content: I like this little camera but was very disappointed to see it on sale at Target 2 weeks later for only $50.

Reviews.Title: Too small
Reviews.Author: Wayne Elias
Reviews.Content: The camera was good, but it's size was too small. Not what we expected, size wise. Like the bigger Nikon camera.

Reviews.Title: Not a bad camera
Reviews.Author: mfrazier
Reviews.Content: Not a bad camera for the price. It's definitely not a camera that will take pictures that go in magazines, but it's a point-and-shoot that will get the job done. I have no complaints as of yet.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera.
Reviews.Author: Suzanne Busta
Reviews.Content: I like the camera because it small and easy to carry. I also like the way it takes pictures and the way you can delete the picture if you are not satisfied with it. It is also easy to bring up pictures you have taken to view them to see if you want to keep them on you memory card.

Reviews.Title: Not loving it, liking it
Reviews.Author: Teri L. F. Roberts
Reviews.Content: This camera has some really great features that are very fun to work with.It takes GREAT pics when the lighting and the focus box is on the right subject.I need to mess with it more, and I'll keep it.

Reviews.Title: Slow shutter speed
Reviews.Author: Main Street Veterinary Hospital
Reviews.Content: We use it to take pictures of pets. Pets don't sit still. The shutter speed is too slow for our use. Great pictures though.

Reviews.Title: Camera takes good pics but has a cheap plastic feel
Reviews.Author: Vin
Reviews.Content: Pros: camera takes decent pictures; has a lot of modes to take picturesCons: cheap plastic feel...USB cord not provided which is a pain..the blue color is not a subtle blueHave to wait to see the durability of the camera.

Reviews.Title: Not So Happy
Reviews.Author: Nancy Chapman
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera because I wanted something easy to use and not deal with alot of effort to get good pictures. I have been disappointed every time I use this camera. The pictures seem to come out blurry looking and dark. Now I am scared to use it for all my kids activities because I don't want to not have memories because of a camera that isn't what I had expected it to be.

Reviews.Title: It's okay
Reviews.Author: Mary Y
Reviews.Content: Spent two entire days thoroughly comparing 'easy to use' cameras and finally chose this one.Hmm.....should have spent more money and gotten something else. Seems like almost all of my photosare somewhat blurry, and can't figure out why. Have never had this problem before. Maybe it will befine for others, but this is my experience.

Reviews.Title: A Very Good And Solid Camera
Reviews.Author: Charles R
Reviews.Content: I Love These Canon Elph Cameras. They are easy to learn and easy to use. They take great pictures and video is excellent also. 16 MP photos and 720 HD video here. I use my cameras a lot so they usually only last about a year. With the last two Canon Powershot cameras it's the video that has had issues. But for the price I do not expect perfection or for them to last forever. Yes I am loyal to the brand. And yes I would recommend these to my friends.

Reviews.Title: nice
Reviews.Author: Jia
Reviews.Content: Pixel is goodColor is very suitable for girlsUse a very small and convenientThat is good, i love it.

Reviews.Title: Canon Powershot ELPH 115
Reviews.Author: nta699
Reviews.Content: I needed a small compact camera, point and shoot, that I could have with me all the time. I like the dslr but for something handy and not so cumbersome for spontaneous shots the Canon works perfect.

Reviews.Title: Canon powerShot ELPH 115: just perfect for me.
Reviews.Author: Classic Jazz Fan
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a digital camera that is easy to use and takes good photos.  This camera is perfect for me.  My wife and I like to have a camera with us on trips, and even on walks.  You never know when a photo opportunity will strike!  Imlike the large view screen, and the telephoto capabilities.  It is easy to use, it is easy to download the photos onto my computer, in general, very easy !

Reviews.Title: Elph takes 'middlin'' photos
Reviews.Author: Sally T
Reviews.Content: Though compact and easy to use, the "auto" setting takes flat-looking photos and the clarity is just so-so. Editing on my Mac helps a tad.  My Panasonic Lumix , (the repari ws too expensive)was far,far superior, and I wish I would have opted fro another Panasonic.

Reviews.Title: LOVE it...
Reviews.Author: Amy LaViolette
Reviews.Content: Great little camera, great pictures and easy to use, I would recommend it to anyone looking for a care free camera

Reviews.Title: The team liked this very much.
Reviews.Author: linda hermann
Reviews.Content: The team liked this very much.it is for our Product team to use for projectsthis is what they requested.

Reviews.Title: In general this product is "Not Bad"
Reviews.Author: Tahmoores Mazhari
Reviews.Content: In my point of view these are the advantages of buying this product :1. It is cheap and affordable2. It looks good and it is a nice looking camera3. It takes very good and sharp pictures in Close-Up mode.4. The quality of video is reasonable.And here are the disadvantages :1. Although this camera is 16 MP but pictures taken by this camera have less quality than pictures taken by Casio Exilim 12MP2. While capturing video, if you zoom in or out, the sound of the mechanical movement of the lens is recorded in your video which is a very disappointing issue.3. It has very few options for taking photos manually.

Reviews.Title: Not as great as the SD 1100 IS
Reviews.Author: Norm12 "Norm12"
Reviews.Content: Love the longer zoom and more megapixels but in comparison to my SD 1100 IS the menus are a little inconvenient to naviagate, not even a quick start menu to speak of or an optical view finder. Pics and video are very good, however, which is the most important part.

Reviews.Title: Good camera for family pcitures!
Reviews.Author: Magnolia Hemingway
Reviews.Content: It's easy to use, good quality of the pictures. It's a little difficult so download pictures to the computer because is very slow.

Reviews.Title: DO NOT BUY THIS CAMERA --  DOES NOT WORK -- TRASH!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "flowergirl"
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera twice.  Once as a gift and once for myself.  I found out after i purchased the 2d one that neither one worked.  It has a battery charger and i also purchased the cable.  After charging it still would not turn on...so I have a $100 camera that doesn't work and my gift was the same.  I wanted it because it was small enough to fit into my purse and was supposed to take great pictures ---->>>> IF IT WOULD WORK!!!!DO NOT BUY this camera...you have been warned!!!!!  :-(

Reviews.Title: not an improved model
Reviews.Author: G. Burnick
Reviews.Content: I'm a Canon Elph fan -- have had several and still do. Wanted to upgrade to a 16mp. I got this and compared same images taken with my 10mp. My 10mp took better photos. Some were fairly close to same. But overall, these were slightly tinted orange. Returned this immediately.

Reviews.Title: great camera if you never need to figure out how to adjust settings
Reviews.Author: rono
Reviews.Content: Last night I was trying to take pictures of a full moon rising over a lake. O.K., so I'm In the dark and I'm trying to feel for the little ring with the button on the middle and the menu button in the corner and I find these things OK but when the displays come up there's all this BS about smile detector and red eye yada yada  and then always, whenever I want to try a picture without the flash and I can never figure out a simple way to turn flash on and off, and it's just  just hit and miss, so sometimes when I finally get it turned off then I can't turn it back on again though usually it goes back to automatic by default.And then there were settings that COULD have been useful for what I was trying to do like a low light setting and another setting to leave the shutter open longer and that one always likes to get set by accident so when I'm trying to capture a picture in a hurry and the shutter takes forever. Bottom line was that from fiddling around with it I managed to blunder into the right settings ONCE out of 10 pics and got one decent picture but have no idea how I did it.There needs to be a  separate "SET" button apart from the button in the middle of the ring which seems to have multiple functions and the ring itself does things other than let you highlight functions.The camera is good quality but is a nightmare for a non-techie to try to operate. Doesn't anyone make a camera that just does the basics and has a logical way of making simple adjustments?  Hopefully I can sell this turkey and find something that doesn't require a five week tutorial or a 20 page indecipherable users manual to learn how to operate multiple functions that I don't want or need aside from the basics that I DO need.Someone else pointed out that the controls are "Less than intuitive" and that is the understatement .

Reviews.Title: DOA
Reviews.Author: melisa pendergrass
Reviews.Content: Well, I can't necessarily speak to the quality of the item when it arrives with an LCD that doesn't work. So, I'll give it a 1. The reviews make this seem like a fun little spare camera (though why would anyone buy a point and shoot to legitimately "get in to photography" is beyond me) to keep around. That's what I'd have used it for. Until next time...

Reviews.Title: Nice camera for STILL SHOTS !  NOT for Kids, Pets, or Sports.
Reviews.Author: RzKs
Reviews.Content: It is SO hard to find a Review that mentions the LACK of Picture Option called Pets/Kids on this model.Because THERE ISN'T ANY !!!!It LOOKS the same as the Elph-330, and has GOBS of Picture options (Fish-eye, warped, special effects, etc.) BUT NOT for subject in Motion (like KIDS or Pets).WHY do we buy a light, pocket camera ??? - - for taking pics ON-THE-GO !!!  At a party...look what the kids are doing?... Press ON, Point...Press the Shutter... and Review that cute moment... :)  That is what we EXPECT of such a Pocket Camera.We have had at least 3 ELPH models that have been used until the lens cover got stuck.... BUT ALL HAD the "KIDS/PETS" photo option. GREAT SHOTS of the grandson kicking the ball, or water baloon exploding on the lawn...NOW - these new models have ALL the same shutter control Technology,  BUT -  the software options only address FEW of the capabilities the ELPH-330 or SLRs do.So, my wife sees it and wants a Backup Elph. I said make SURE it has the KIDS/PETS  photo option.She gets this ELPH-115... after being assured by a salesperson that it does.... naturally the buyer cannot access the User Manual  to find that option.  So, she got it.  After charging the Special battery a bit, and put our older MemCard in... I turn it on,and..... NO  KIDS/PETS  option !!!!!!  There - Honey... TAKE IT BACK !"But it look the same as our Elph-330..."  That is why it is Half the $$ Dear...SO - - - like ALL advertisements go - - -  IF IT IS NOT BRAGGED ABOUT.... IT DO NOT GOT IT !!!  Get it ?  Lesson learned!

Reviews.Title: It is what I expected
Reviews.Author: Ray Worthington
Reviews.Content: I have not discovered how to post the dates on the photos.Small & meets expectations. Stores easily & simple to operate

Reviews.Title: Quickly broke
Reviews.Author: Julie C.
Reviews.Content: The automatic lens cover broke fairly quickly after this camera was purchased. We bought a warranty and so will return it, but it's time consuming to deal with stuff like that. We actually bought two and it only happened to one of them, for what that's worth. The zoom isn't strong at all, but they were purchased for tweens and the kids love them.

Reviews.Title: Didn't like this one.
Reviews.Author: Sarah B
Reviews.Content: It was slow to write to memory card and it didn't, in my opinion, take the clearest pics.the lens broke after a week and I returned it

Reviews.Title: Acceptable but not impressive
Reviews.Author: Shari L Schubert (home)
Reviews.Content: Camera is acceptable for the low price, but excessively small and cryptic to operate. OK for my use, which is as a second camera (I normally use a digital SLR). Complete instruction book is not included in the package. Like other point-and-shoot cameras that have only a display screen and no viewfinder, the display screen is almost impossible to view in some lighting situations.

Reviews.Title: Somewhat disappointed
Reviews.Author: Bill Forcht
Reviews.Content: Takes good pictures, compact size. Negatives are it does not come with a cable to download to my laptop, no SD card included, no internal memory, no case and just feels flimsy and cheap. Time will tell how it holds up. If I had physically touched it and looked at it I would not have bought it. Directions are a joke.

Reviews.Title: Didn't come with complimentary scan disc & case
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: It was supposed to come with free complimentary 16GB scan disc & case and it was not included. The gift recipient, a teenager was disappointed she couldn't take Christmas pictures right away.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera !!
Reviews.Author: Kanthi
Reviews.Content: Compact and takes nice pictures ... I bought this as a gift to my aunt and they love it ..

Reviews.Title: Fabulous!
Reviews.Author: Seattleite
Reviews.Content: This is so small, light, pictures are so clear, so easy to operate, zoom really works, less expensive on Amazon...I love it!

Reviews.Title: Cannon Power Shot ELPH 115 16MP Digital Camera(pink)
Reviews.Author: Marie Maki
Reviews.Content: This is the best camera ever.  It is easy to use and it takes the best pictures ever. I would recommend it to anyone.

Reviews.Title: good camera
Reviews.Author: dreamer
Reviews.Content: I like the way it works. Easy to use. Pictures look good. I will enjoy using this camera. Pretty blue color.

Reviews.Title: Just what I wanted!
Reviews.Author: S. Paulen "blondie"
Reviews.Content: Been wanting a small camera for a while. Some friends had this one so I oozed for it online and you had it. I am enjoying it.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera!
Reviews.Author: linda behrens
Reviews.Content: The camera is everything I expected. It is easy to use and the photos come out great. I love it.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: Cynthia Irons
Reviews.Content: Have ten grandchildren living in two different states!  Great for catching them at fun times when they visit and sharing with others via internet.

Reviews.Title: Canon Camera 115
Reviews.Author: Robert Camper
Reviews.Content: Great Camera, really like and compact, the software program that comeswith camera,well it sucks in my opinion but you can used another program.

Reviews.Title: Transfer cable
Reviews.Author: Lebanon Conservation District
Reviews.Content: It did NOT come with the camera to computer cable to download pictures.  Camera is nice and works well.  Very Disappointed.

Reviews.Title: Canon Powershot ELPH 115 16 MP
Reviews.Author: James W. Hartley
Reviews.Content: It seems to be perfect for someone like me (old retired guy).  It's extremely compact and easy to carry and it seems to take both good photos and video.  I've only had it for a few days, but the early indications (to me) are that will be perfect.

Reviews.Title: Cheap but a canon is a canon
Reviews.Author: Richard G.
Reviews.Content: Was surprised how small and y it was, but it is a canon.. It works well . Seems to take great photos and videos

Reviews.Title: ELPH CAMERA
Reviews.Author: HAL P MCHORRIS
Reviews.Content: RECEIVED AS PROMISED. HAVE USED THE CAMERA ON A COUPLE OF OCCASIONS WITH GOOD RESULTS. PERFORMS AS ADVERTISED. WOULD RECOMMEND AS A LOW TECH SMALL CAMERA THAT TAKES GREAT PHOTOS.

Reviews.Title: Really below my expectations
Reviews.Author: Avraham S. Kroll
Reviews.Content: I figured that since this was a newer camera that it would be better than my three year old one but it definitely was not. First of all it is so slow to do anything. My older camera you press the shutter and it takes a picture, this one you press the shutter and then have to wait for it to take the picture besides that it takes a long time to focus. Also to erase a picture you have to almost read the manual to figure out how to do it and even then it takes so long to do. I am very unimpressed with this camera.

Reviews.Title: No USB cord??
Reviews.Author: sofikate2010
Reviews.Content: I really like the camera, it works good, the only thing that do not make sense for me is that it does not include the power cord or USB cord. How am I supposed to download my pics or videos to my PC. The manufacturer told me I have to purchase the cord, so I guess that is what I have to do instead of return the package and deal with it!

Reviews.Title: don't like it
Reviews.Author: Debbie
Reviews.Content: After 2 months of having this camera, the pictures are fuzzy and if you take a picture of something with a subject in it, little white squares appear on the picture

Reviews.Title: Not what I'd expect from Canon
Reviews.Author: Rebekah K. "avid reader and technophile"
Reviews.Content: I've owned numerous Canon cameras in the past, including a DSLR. I'm not new to photography and am a good photographer. So when I was looking for a small point and shoot, with macro abilities, I picked up this little guy. I was sorely disappointed.First off, the camera doesn't even come with a transfer cable. That is annoying because I'm using a computer that was built from scratch and doesn't have a card reader installed on it. Secondly, this camera arrived without a battery or wrist strap as well. I picked up a spare battery, to test out the camera (to see if I wanted an exchange or a refund) and the photos all come out blurry. I know how to take a good photo, and this camera defies skill. It doesn't matter what I did, the photos were blurry.I sent it back for a refund and I'll be buying Sony or Samsung next.

Reviews.Title: Canon PowerShot
Reviews.Author: Lena L. Wardlouise
Reviews.Content: I haven't had time to spend with the camera.  Hopefully when I do have time, I will enjoy using it.

Reviews.Title: Small enough for your pocket
Reviews.Author: Mary L Fenner
Reviews.Content: This is not an expensive camera, but my purchase was based on size and convenience. It was perfect for slipping in my pocket or purse for our week at Disneyland.

Reviews.Title: If I could rate this less than 1 star, I would
Reviews.Author: Cheryl L Higman
Reviews.Content: I have been using the Canon Elph series for over a decade now... This will be my 4th generation (and last) that I purchase. I love the elphs because they are cheap (I drop things) and they take nice pictures that I can blow up. Basically they are a good bang for the buck.This camera is basically terrible. The camera itself is slow, but meh that's a thing I can deal with. The thing that sucks about this camera is there is limited ability of manual control. The camera compresses the images and the sensors are so out of wac that I all my pictures are grainy beyond a 4x6 print. This camera is great if you are looking for a thumbnail on facebook or instagram (but that's what cell phones are for). In fact, my Galaxy S3 takes a better picture.

Reviews.Title: Blurry, terrible pictures
Reviews.Author: chocolatecurls
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my mom and for myself.  I am sorry to say that this 16MP camera took blurrier pictures than my 2 year old cell phone 8pm camera.  Every picture I took was grainy, even in natural lighting.  I tested all the settings in different light conditions, but nothing I did improved the quality of the pictures.  This was the case for both my camera and the one I purchased for my mom.

Reviews.Title: Great Except Missing Power Cord
Reviews.Author: Hannah Scott
Reviews.Content: The product came quickly and it was exactly what I expected. The only down side of this is the box contents said a power cord would be included and it was no where to be found :(

Reviews.Title: SHAME ON CANON
Reviews.Author: Amazon_shopper "Amazon_shopper"
Reviews.Content: So despite the fact that my entire family has PowerShot cameras, and this takes decent pictures in daylight....ONE STAR for skimping on the BASIC COMPONENTS needed to transfer photos onto a computer.All the previous models came with the cable that runs from camera to your computer's USB port, and at least a small  capacity memory card.  I guess I'm lucky this even came with a battery.  Shame on greed-fueled Canon for cutting the necessary components in order to make more profit margin.  Next time I will buy a camera "bundle" from Costco, which has great prices and transparent  packaging that shows you all contents up front.

Reviews.Title: Be Advised
Reviews.Author: dakellymon
Reviews.Content: Be advised that you will have to buy a memory card and a USB cord for this camera which will add about $25 or more depending on the size of the card you want to get.  I bought this camera for my granddaughter on her 4th birthday.  She and I were very disappointed that we had to to get a cord and card before she could use it.I can't comment on the quality of the pictures until I get these items and can actually use the camera..

Reviews.Title: not satisfied
Reviews.Author: Ron Williams
Reviews.Content: This camera is really cute and I love the color. It was my Valentine's Day gift from my husband.  We were both dissapointed to find that, perhaps this was a used camera.  It was shipped without a memory card and a USB cord.  There were fingerprints on the lens because there was no protective plastic on it.  This was very displeasing especially because it was a gift. We are returning it!!

Reviews.Title: Memory
Reviews.Author: Marcelo
Reviews.Content: this camera has a external memory card, is this including in the sale? and internal memory? thanks you very much

Reviews.Title: Camera had a black mark down the center of it when it arrived could not take pictures with camera without line appearing
Reviews.Author: Hart
Reviews.Content: When camera arrived it had a big thick line down the middle of it so I could not take pictures without line appearing in all of my pictures

Reviews.Title: Not Satisfied
Reviews.Author: RANJIT CHAUDHARY
Reviews.Content: Don't buy any China made item ever, my camera screen damaged automatically in just two week.i don't know what to do with this can i return it ?

Reviews.Title: Good camera - Good price
Reviews.Author: GridOrange
Reviews.Content: It was a gift for my wife. She loves it. She wanted a small camera and this certainly is. This is our 5th Canon and we like em. Small cameras, imho, don't take good enough pictures, unless you have perfect conditions. The main trick for this and all small form factor cameras is size. If you want a small, on the go camera, this is it.

Reviews.Title: It's ok.
Reviews.Author: Ashley Bowling
Reviews.Content: I bought the camera for a vacation. Took a few photos before the trip. I didn't like the way I photographed on the camera…. however my best friend looked amazing and I sold it to her. She likes it and it works well.

Reviews.Title: "mazin
Reviews.Author: Matthew Lyons
Reviews.Content: This camera right hur is da s*** for tak'n sum nasty photos of ja moms butt. i do find it quite pleasant.

Reviews.Title: Disappointed
Reviews.Author: D. Harris
Reviews.Content: Bought as a gift. It wasn't made clear that there was no card or cable. I shouldn't have to go out and buy something else to get the pictures off the camera. It should come with at least one or the other. I was getting ready to wrap it and thank goodness I opened it to find out that there's no card or cable. Purchased as Amazon deal or the day which is supposed to be a great price. Then after purchasing the price drops by more than $10. I won't be trusting "deals of the day" anymore.

Reviews.Title: Not what I expected
Reviews.Author: Robio
Reviews.Content: Picture quality was horrible. Video focus problems. View finder started showing strange lines on the right half if the screen. Returned camera for refund.

Reviews.Title: Prints are date stamped, no Option?
Reviews.Author: E Judson Jennings
Reviews.Content: This is my third canon digital point and shoot, very happy with the first two, this one not so much. Two related problems:1. No manual, sure it is available online, but that means reading on screen or a bulky printout, Ugh!2. My photos are fine until I upload them to my computer to make prints. The pix all have a prominent date stamp right on the picture, and I can neither remove it or find a camera setting that eliminates it.I hope I am missing something, if not I definitely will return this camera and bid Canon a fond farewell.JJ

Reviews.Title: Was missing the memory card and chord to connect to computer :(
Reviews.Author: Lauren Allen
Reviews.Content: All that came in the box was the camera and battery charger. I think it is too late to send it back :(

Reviews.Title: Wrong color delivered :(
Reviews.Author: Jeanette Collins
Reviews.Content: All my niece asked for was a blue camera so that's what I ordered. Instead of getting a blue camera, I received a black one. Not happy about that. Haven't had the chance to see the quality yet but after not getting something as small as the color right.....one can only hope. We'll see

Reviews.Title: not yet
Reviews.Author: Michael Buck
Reviews.Content: this camera is a gift for my ten year old daughter. she has not opened the camera yet so i can not review

Reviews.Title: burnt powershot
Reviews.Author: Bonnie
Reviews.Content: By accident someone put the bix in the paper burn pile and the camera was still in the box. It was destroyed. Bought another one just like it at Walmart. My mom had a tough time with the directions and all the buttons. The Walmart sales person sold us the wrong memory card so we didn't even get ti take any puctures. I returned the camera and card to Walmart and will go to another store with better stocked products and get my mom a different brand of camera.

Reviews.Title: Pure Trash!
Reviews.Author: A. I. Haque
Reviews.Content: This may be one of the worst products I have ever bought in my entire life. Does NOT store even one pic without the memory card which is NOT included. Used massive amounts of force to attempt to open the cover to the USB port which did not open. Instead chunks of toxic heavy metal went flying. Had to throw it in the trash (except for the battery which must be properly recycled). I will NEVER buy another canon camera ever again!!!

Reviews.Title: not enough  help to operate camera
Reviews.Author: davis nutt
Reviews.Content: can't figure out how to use the camera would not recommend it . not enough information to show you how to see pictures. Do you put on computer of have developed.

Reviews.Title: YOU HAVE TO BUY A MEMORY CARD, FOLKS!!!!!
Reviews.Author: quite caucasian
Reviews.Content: While I realize its fairly common these days to sell stuff with not even a nominal memory card, it would have been nice if AMAZON would PROMINENTLY MENTION THAT YOU NEED TO BUY A MEMORY CARD in the product description....for crying out loud.  Godd*mit.
